Aside from his successful acting career, Fraser is an advocate for environmental causes. He has been a strong supporter of organizations like WWF and Rainforest Alliance, using his platform to raise awareness about the importance of conservation and sustainability.

Throughout his illustrious career, Fraser has received numerous accolades and awards, including the AACTA International Award for Best Actor for "Encanto" in 2022. As of now, the talented actor continues to work on new projects and inspire audiences worldwide with his dedication to both his craft and the environment.
